dev.simmons.data

Interface AccountOwnerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PostgresAccountOwnerDAO

    public interface AccountOwnerDAO
    A Data Access Object used to handle joins between Clients and Accounts.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • addOwner

        boolean addOwner(int accountId,
                 int clientId)
        Add the relationship between an account and an owner.
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account_id of the account to join with an owner.
        clientId - The client_id of the owner of the account
        Returns:
        True if the insertion is successful, false otherwise.

      • addOwner

        boolean addOwner(Account account,
                 Client client)
        Add the relationship between an account and an owner.
        Parameters:
        account - The account object that holds the account_id of the account to join.
        client - The client object that holds the client_id of the account to join.
        Returns:
        True if the insertion is successful, false otherwise.

      • getOwners

        List<Client> getOwners(int accountId)
        Get the list of owners listed on a given account.
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account_id of the account to find the owners.
        Returns:
        The found list of owners of the account. If no owners are registered, will return an empty list.

      • getOwners

        List<Client> getOwners(Account account)
        Get the list of owners listed on a given account.
        Parameters:
        account - The account object that holds the account_id of the account to find the owners.
        Returns:
        The found list of owners of the account. If no owners are registered, will return an empty list.

      • getAccounts

        List<Account> getAccounts(int clientId)
        Gets the accounts owned by a given client.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client_id of the client to search for.
        Returns:
        The found list of accounts for the client. If no accounts exist, the list will be empty.

      • getAccounts

        List<Account> getAccounts(Client client)
        Gets the accounts owned by a given client.
        Parameters:
        client - The client object containing the client_id for the given client.
        Returns:
        The found list of accounts for the client. If no accounts exist, the list will be empty.

      • getFullAccountInfo

        List<Account> getFullAccountInfo(int clientId)
        Gets all accounts, including populating the owner list, for a given client.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client_id for the owner's accounts to be searched.
        Returns:
        The found list of accounts, containing the list of 'owners'. If no accounts exist, the list will be empty.

      • getFullAccountInfo

        List<Account> getFullAccountInfo()
        Gets all account information, including their full owner list, for all current accounts.
        Returns:
        The list of accounts, containing the full list of owners. If no accounts exist, the list will be empty.

      • getAccountsSolelyOwned

        List<Account> getAccountsSolelyOwned(int clientId)
        Gets accounts for a client where they are the sole owner.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client_id of the owner whose accounts we're trying to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The list of all that client's accounts for which they are sole owner. If they are not the sole owner for any, the list will be empty.

      • deleteOwner

        boolean deleteOwner(Account account,
                    Client client)
        Remove a client from the list of owners of an account.
        Parameters:
        account - The account object containing the account_id to remove the client from.
        client - The client object containing the client_id to remove from the account.
        Returns:
        True if the deletion was successful, false otherwise.

      • deleteOwner

        boolean deleteOwner(int accountId,
                    int clientId)
        Remove a client from the list of owners of an account.
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account_id for the account which we are trying to remove the client.
        clientId - The client_id of the client we are trying to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the deletion is successful, false otherwise.
